Hi, I'm Quang. I am a senior AI engineer. I live and work in Paris, France.

I have been working at the intersection of AI, GenAI, ML, CV, NLP, LLM and software engineering.

My experience spans GenAI web applications, AI Android/iOS mobile applications, edge device AI, AI-based photography applications, computer vision applications, LLM-based chatbots,  advanced RAG systems and more.
